name: 紀集祥
objective: In each class, the students will have a hands-on writing practice.  The hands-on English writing practices will include different themes, such as English email writing, various kinds of writing topics from news, TOEIC, TOEFL, and GEPT. The grammar, vocabulary, and organization of the students' hands-on writings will be analyzed in class.  Furthermore, students will be put in groups and make a presentation.  The presentation is about an important grammar rule that will be used in the English writings.
